about_the_game:
This pack will upgrade your Terminal Conflict Commander in Chief Edition to the Supreme Commander Edition, which will provide you with the following extra content*:

Supreme Commander Terminal (cosmetic):

Set in deep dark metallic tones, a dark terminal for the dark minded. Treat yourself, for that feel of ultimate power. The manufacturer guarantees that it's quality non-stick surface requires no cleaning or maintenance.

Special Achievement (cosmetic):

Supreme Commander Steam Achievement unlocked.

Unique American Polices:

Three unique US policies in your home theater of North America that can be enacted.

Unique Soviet Polices:

Three unique USSR policies in your home theater of Eastern Europe that can be enacted.

Decisions:

Five new decisions that create unique opportunities.


*Extra content does not provide you an advantage in Multiplayer. When connecting to a player with a higher tier DLC the game for both players will always play the highest DLCs available.
detailed_description:
This pack will upgrade your Terminal Conflict Commander in Chief Edition to the Supreme Commander Edition, which will provide you with the following extra content*:

Supreme Commander Terminal (cosmetic):

Set in deep dark metallic tones, a dark terminal for the dark minded. Treat yourself, for that feel of ultimate power. The manufacturer guarantees that it's quality non-stick surface requires no cleaning or maintenance.

Special Achievement (cosmetic):

Supreme Commander Steam Achievement unlocked.

Unique American Polices:

Three unique US policies in your home theater of North America that can be enacted.

Unique Soviet Polices:

Three unique USSR policies in your home theater of Eastern Europe that can be enacted.

Decisions:

Five new decisions that create unique opportunities.


*Extra content does not provide you an advantage in Multiplayer. When connecting to a player with a higher tier DLC the game for both players will always play the highest DLCs available.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard are required. / Internet Connection or 1 vs 1 Ranked multiplayer, or Direct connect in multiplayer mode.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard are required. / Internet Connection or 1 vs 1 Ranked multiplayer, or Direct connect in multiplayer mode.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900, 512mb video memory required
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard are required. / Internet Connection or 1 vs 1 Ranked multiplayer, or Direct connect in multiplayer mode.
